Detailed Description

OMax.state2id external.

This external returns the starting and ending dates (in ms, Data Sequence domain) of a given state (FO domain) in Max5

Definition at line 30 of file OMax.state2id.c.

Member Function Documentation

bool OMax_state2id_bind ( t_OMax_state2id *  x  ) 

Bind the date reader with Data Structure.

Remarks:
Do this binding only once

Check if oname points to an existing OMax.oracle object. If so, set t_OMax_date2state::data to point to the Data Sequence structure (t_OMax_data::data member)
